title: Bleedthrough and Other Small Horrors
description: EVERYTHING BEGINS WITH BLOOD. A virtual-reality getaway stirs up latent malice. A lingering illness hides a truly monstrous malady. A young girl realizes her new stepmother is something other than human, while a dying man's last wish bestows his ghoulish lover with the most intimate of gifts. A solitary occultist wakes to find his summoning ritual gone horribly awry, a mother's grief leads her into a resort's troubled past, and a teenage girl's growing pains mark the beginning of an otherworldly change. These and other stories await in Bleedthrough and Other Small Horrors , the debut collection of dark short fiction from Scarlett R. Algee.
author: Scarlett R. Algee
